primary.context: Customer cannot access their account to view or pay fees.
primary.detail: The agent failed to verify the account after multiple attempts and transferred the caller to the concierge department.

steps: Customer requested to pay maintenance fees and reported account access issues.
Agent attempted account lookup via contract ID.
Agent successfully pulled a record but failed to match the customer's name to the record on file.
Agent repeated an incorrect name (Kenneth Beaumont) which the customer denied.
After multiple failed verification attempts, the agent transferred the call to the concierge department.

failure.detail: The agent pulled up a completely different name (Kenneth Beaumont) despite the customer providing a specific contract ID and her own name.

corrections.note: Customer rejects the name Kenneth Beaumont

loops.subject: name spelling
loops.note: Agent repeatedly asks for name spelling

actions.detail: Looked up record using contract ID 350375
Name Sandra Haining did not match Kenneth Beaumont
Transferred to concierge after verification failure

insights.summary: The customer wanted to pay maintenance fees but couldn't log in. The AI found a record using the contract ID but it belonged to a different person, leading to a verification failure and transfer.
insights.verbatim: I'm looking at owner's invoice. And my name is on the owner's invoice. Sandra... Haining.
insights.coaching: The agent should have a fallback for when a contract ID returns a mismatched name, perhaps by verifying other details or acknowledging a potential data error before transferring.
